Option V: The technical personnel worked overtime to complete their tasks.
Text: The technical personnel worked overtime to complete their tasks because the project deadline was approaching.
Translation: The technical personnel worked overtime to complete their tasks because the project deadline was approaching.
Option G: In our family, we have warm, friendly relationships.
Text: In our family, we have warm, friendly relationships that make us feel happy and content.
Translation: In our family, we have warm, friendly relationships that make us feel happy and content.
Option D: To achieve a higher level of education, you need to work hard.
